Description: Rows with matching values in both tables
Result: Only matching rows from both tables

Description: All rows from left table + matched rows from right
Result: All left rows, NULL for right if no match

Description: All rows from right table + matched rows from left
Result: All right rows, NULL for left if no match

Description: All rows with match in either table
Result: All rows from both tables, NULLs where no match
Every combination of rows from both tables
Compare rows within the same table
